text: He nabi! Apanara jan'ya apanara striganake halala karechi, yaderake apani moharana pradana karena. Ara dasiderake halala karechi, yaderake allaha apanara karayatba kare dena ebam bibahera jan'ya baidha karechi apanara cacato bhagni, phuphato bhagni, mamato bhagni, khalato bhagnike yara apanara sathe hijarata kareche. Kona mumina nari yadi nijeke nabira kache samarpana kare, nabi take bibaha karate ca'ile se'o halala. Eta bisesa kare apanara'i jan'ya-an'ya muminadera jan'ya naya. Apanara asubidha durikaranera uddese. Muminaganera stri o dasidera byapare ya nirdharita karechi amara jana ache. Allaha ksamasila, dayalu.
